tweet: Please beware of anyone claiming to have a partnership or collaboration with #Cardano or the #CardanoFoundation. Avoid using/accessing third party wallets & apps claiming to support staking or giving high % rewards for your (ADA) assets: beware of scams! #CardanoCommunity
